item.title: MongoDB Addon Overview | Stash
item.description: Stash MongoDB Addon Stash 0.9.0+ supports extending its functionality through addons. Stash MongoDB addon enables Stash to backup and restore MongoDB databases. This guide will give you an overview of which MongoDB versions are supported and how the docs are organized. Supported MongoDB Versions Stash supports backup and restore of the following MongoDB versions: 3.4 3.4.17 3.4.22 3.6 3.6.8 3.6.13 4.0 4.0.3 4.0.5 4.0.11 4.1 4.1.4 4.1.7 4.1.13 Version M.
